name: delay(for:tolerance:scheduler:options:)
desc: Delays delivery of all output to the downstream receiver by a specified amount of time on a particular scheduler.
declaration: func delay<S>(for interval: S.SchedulerTimeType.Stride, tolerance: S.SchedulerTimeType.Stride? = nil, scheduler: S, options: S.SchedulerOptions? = nil) -> Publishers.Delay<Self, S> where S : Scheduler
